oh yes.translation[0].definitions[0].def: used to show that you do not believe what someone is saying
oh yes.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: ‘There’s nothing going on between me and Jane. We’re just good friends.’ ‘Oh yes?’
oh yes.translation[0].definitions[1].def: used to show that you have remembered something
oh yes.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Where’s my umbrella? Oh yes – I left it in the car.
